name: 3-inch Abrasive Wire Brush Wheel with 1/4-inch Quick Hex Shank, Coarse 0.012, 2-Pack
short_description: Get that project done for less with these wire wheels from Harrier Hardware!
These abrasive 3-inch (3") wire wheels feature a 1/4-inch (0.25") quick-connect shank that fits most standard impact drills
Use these wire wheels to strip and remove rust, paint, and contaminants from wood, concrete, paint, plastic, metal, and more!
Coarse 0.012-inch thick (0.012") wires are good for rough removal
Includes (2) 3-inch wire wheels with drill shanks

name: 6PCS Professional Wire Wheel Brush Set, Carbon Steel Cup Wire Brush for Drill with 1/4 Inch Hex Shank, Wire Brushes Drill Attachments for Cleaning Rust Removal, Corrosion & Scrub Surfaces, Drill Brush
short_description: 【6 Pcs Wheel Wire Brush Set】This wheel wire brush-inspired set includes 6 essential attachments for cleaning: 3 carbon steel wire cup brushes, 2 heavy-duty wire wheel brushes, and 1 precision wire pen brush. All feature a universal 1/4" hex shank for secure, wobble-free compatibility with most drills, ensuring no slipping during intense tasks.

【Professional-Grade Rust Remover】Transform your drill into a powerhouse rust remover for metal, with the aggressive grit of the wire cup and wheel brushes. Effortlessly strip rust, paint, and corrosion from metal surfaces, reviving tools, machinery, automotive parts, and outdoor fixtures like gates or railings.

【Precision Cleaning & Polishing Wheel Brush Tools】Designed as wire brushes for cleaning, this set adapts to metal, wood, and stone. Three bristle densities allow seamless transitions between delicate polishing (e.g., antique restoration) and heavy-duty scrubbing (e.g., weld slag removal), delivering flawlessly smooth finishes.

【Industrial-Strength Durability】Built to outlast drill brush set, these attachments use heat-treated carbon steel bristles resistant to fraying, even at high RPMs. The reinforced hubs prevent disintegration, making them ideal for prolonged use on stubborn grime.This wheel brushes is the perfect choice for cleaning wheels.

【Versatile Applications Wire Brushes】The wire wheel brush set suit for everywhere. From workshop to home: Prep surfaces for welding or painting Scour rust from bolts, pans, and garden tools. Clean engine parts, grills, or stone patios. Safety Tip: Always wear gloves and goggles when operating these wire wheel brushes. Notice: Please wear eye protection!

name: 9 Pcs Wire Wheel Brush Set for Drill,Stainless Steel Wire Cup Wheel with 1/4 Inch Shank for Rust Removal, Corrosion and Scrub Surfaces

STRONG AND DURABLE STEEL WIRE: Carefully selected premium wire steel, bound & balanced expertly & properly together for unsurpassed knotted integrity for longer life, safety, smoothness & ease of use

WIDE APPLICATIONS: Brush set consists of pen type, cup type and wheel type brushes,Iare widely used clean rust,debur edge, polish surfaces ,in domestic and industrial fields,and so on

name: 16-Piece Bore Brush Set - 304 Stainless Steel & Brass Drill Wire Bore Cleaning Brushes - 1/4" Hex Shank for Power Drills, Impact Drivers, Grinders (8/10/12/15/17/19/22/25mm)
short_description: 【Full-Size Dual-Material Kit】 Includes 8 precision sizes (8/10/12/15/17/19/22/25mm) with both 304 stainless steel and brass brushes (1 of each per size, 16 total). Each brush features a 1/4" hex shank for instant compatibility with drills, grinders, and impact drivers.

【Deep-Cleaning Design】 Twisted wire tips flex to access narrow holes, welds, and tight machinery gaps. Engineered for rust removal, paint stripping, and corrosion cleaning without scratching surfaces – ideal for automotive parts, metal fabrication, and tool restoration.

【Industrial-Grade Durability】 304 stainless steel brushes resist corrosion and high-speed friction, while brass wires safely clean softer metals (e.g., copper, aluminum). Reinforced twisted stems withstand heavy-duty use in workshops or garages.
【Optimized Dimensions】 4" total length balances reach and control for angled jobs. Match each task with the exact size (8-25mm) and material – stainless for tough rust, brass for delicate polishing.

【Multi-Use Workshop Essential】 Solve automotive, metalworking, and DIY challenges: clean engine parts, prep welding surfaces, restore tools, or polish fixtures. Store compactly in toolboxes, service vans, or workshops. Drill brush set for rust removal, dual-material wire brushes, small hole cleaning brushes, 304 stainless steel drill brushes

short_description: WHAT IN PACK: 3" Wheel*1, 2.5" Wheel*1, 2" Wheel*1, 1.5" Wheel*1, 2.5" Cup*1, 2" Cup*1, 1” Pen*3

WIDE APPLICATIONS: This brush set consists of pen type, cup type and wheel type brushes. It can be applied to clean rust, strip paint, debur edge, polish surfaces and so on. Different sizes and types of brushes enable to work on various of conditions such as some small and tight spaces, cornors. It works greatly for both metals and wood.
SPECIFICATIONS: 0.012” strengthen carbon steel wires, Max speed 4500 RPM, 1/4” Hex shank
PERFECT FOR DRILL: The 1/4” Hex Shank is perfect for all kinds of drills

STABILITY AND DURABILITY: All types of brushes in this set are coated with harden steel plates to hold the bristles better. In addition to this design, the bristles also engage a reasonable bending to increase the smoothness and flexibility during the process.

name: Double Elite Wire Brush for Drill Set 21 Pcs, Abrasive Wire Wheel for Drill 1/4 Inch Hex Shank, Wire Cup Brush for Drill, Drill Wire Brush Coarse Crimped Carbon Steel, Wire Brush Drill Attachments
short_description: 【Cost-Efficient 21 Pcs Kit of Wire Brush for Drill】Double Elite wire brush for drill kit includes 21 pcs wire brushes for home projects use. There are 15 pcs of wire wheels for drill, 3 wire cup brushes for drill, and 3 wire end brushes. The wire wheel for drill kit is much cost-efficient than buying from a local tool store.

【More Durable with Upgraded Wires】The drill wire brushes are well-filled with crimped, untempered 0.012 Inch carbon steel wires. We specially upgrade the number and thickness of the bristles（1-1.5times) to ensure that the wire will not quickly fall off during intensive operation. All wires are rigidly secured to a safety-designed cup-shaped metal holder for added durability.

【Securer with 1/4” Hex Shank Design】The wire brush drill attachments are easy to use, simply attaching to a drill then use. The 1/4-inch (6.35 mm) hex shank makes them easier for fixing on a drill and won’t fall off easily like round shank ones. Meanwhile, the hex shank covers wider drills including a regular power drill as well as a pneumatic air drill, etc.

【3 Different Types for Different Surfaces】The wire brush for drill set includes 3 types of drill wire brushes in 6 sizes, so to cover your most need in a home project, wide space or narrow one. The 5 wire wheels for drill cover diameters from 1-1/2 inches (38 mm) to 3 inches (75 mm), best for inner / side de-rusting job. The 1 wire cup brush with φ2 inches (50 mm) is best for flat surface job. While the small 1 wire end brush with φ 3/4 inch (19 mm) is best for narrow holes and confined areas.

【Wide Application】The drill wire brush set cover wide tasks, such as removing rust / scale / paint, polishing wood crafts, finishing weld seams, and other light to medium-duty surface treatment of metals. For safety, before the work DO wear protective gear, such as goggles, mask, protective gloves and protective clothing.

name: Wire Brush for Drill, Wire Wheel Brush Cup Set, Wire Wheel for Drill 0.012 Carbon Steel Wire, Drill Wire Brush for Drill 1/4 Inch Arbor for Cleaning Rust, Stripping and Drill Attachment
short_description: 5-PIECE DRILL WIRE BRUSH SET: Includes 3in (75 mm)*1 pcs and 2in (50mm)*1 pcs wire wheel brush, 2in(50mm)*1pcs and 2-1/2in (65mm)*1 pcs wire cup brush, 1in (25mm)*1 pcs wire brush. Large-size drill wire brushes are suitable for fast work in large areas and small-size drill wire brushes are suitable for compact spaces and fine work.

NO BREAKAGE & DEFORMATION: Our wire wheel uses 0.012 inch carbon steel crimping wire. It will not be lost or bent during intense use. The wire brush for drill is ideal for removing paint and rust, deburring sharp edges, edge blending, deep cleaning, and more.
SAFE & STRONG: The crimped wire cup brush is rigidly secured to a safety-designed cup-shaped metal holder for added durability and efficient use.

HIGH-INTENSITY WORK: Wire brush for drill are suitable for clamping a 14" electric drill. It can withstand the high-speed operation of 4500 RPM. Long-term use will not appear as asymmetry and distortion.

SUITABLE FOR VARIOUS SURFACES: Clean virtually any surface quickly and easily with these wire wheel brush cup sets. The wire wheel brush combination is suitable for surface treatment such as rust removal, paint stripping, descaling, deburring, edge grinding and polishing on metal and wood surfaces.

name: 6Pcs Professional Wire Wheel, Carbon Steel Wire Brush for Drill, Drill Cup Brush for Cleaning Rust, Wire Brush Drill Attachments with 1/4 Inch Hex Shank
short_description: Versatile Drill Wire Brush Set: Our wire brush drill attachments contains 6 essential steel wire brushes for a wide range of cleaning and maintenance tasks. Carbon Steel Wire Brush Set Includes: 2 Pcs wire cup brushes, 3 Pcs wire wheel brushes, 1 Pcs wire pen brush, and all are 1/4 inch hex shank, fits most drills and no falling off

Efficient Polishing Across Surfaces: Whether you're working on metal, wood, or stone, our wire brushes for drill ensure a smooth, polished finish. The three different wire brush sizes allow for precise control, making them ideal for intricate detailing or larger surface areas, delivering professional results

Reliable Rust Removal: Our wire cup brushes are designed for grinding, effortlessly removing rust, paint, corrosion, restoring their appearance. Ideal for restoring old tools, cleaning machinery, and maintaining automotive parts

Good-Quality Materials: Wire brush is constructed with tough, long-lasting steel bristles, these abrasive cup brushes are made from high-quality carbon steel wire that withstand high RPMs and extended use without losing effectiveness.

Wide Applications: Cup brush set suitable for welding preparation, cleaning rust off bolts, scraping off old paint, household maintenance, such as strip the rust off of your gates, clean up your rusty tools and pans, and more. For safety, make sure you wear safety glasses and gloves before you working

name: 9 Pack Wire Brush for Drill Set, Wire Wheel for Drill 1/4 Inch Hex Shank,Wire Cup Brush for Drill, Wire Brushes for Cleaning Rust
short_description: 【Cost-Effective Wire Brush for Drill Bits】 Drill wire brush set of 9 pcs, including 4 pcs wire wheels for drill, 3 pcs wire cup brush for drill and 3 wire end brushes. Drill wire brush set Ideal for home rust removal work.

【Production process upgrade】Wire brush bit attachments are made from curled, untempered 0.012" carbon steel wire. upgraded from 60A carbon steel to 72A carbon steel, and upgraded in number and thickness (1-1.5 times).They are securely fastened to a securely designed cup-shaped metal holder that will not lose or bend during intense use.

【Stronger 1/4” Hex Shank】1/4" (6.35mm) hex shank has better stability and is stronger than the regular round shank (6mm) and will not come off as easily as the round shank.Wire brush drill attachments can withstand the high speed of the 4500RMP.

【More Robust Wire Brush for Drill】The standard 1/4 hex shank is compatible with most drill tools on the market,including a regular power drill as well as a pneumatic air drill, etc.Long-term use of the cup brush will not be asymmetrical and distorted.

The drill wire wheels set has diversified specifications to meet different surface descaling work.The wire wheel drill includes 3inch (75mm), 2-1/2inch (62.5mm), 2 inch (50mm), 1-1/2 inch (38mm), wire cup brush for drill size is 2-1/2inch (62.5mm), 2inch (50mm) for flat work, 1 inch ( 25mm) wire end brush is suitable for working in a relatively small space.
